title: Bright and Sunny Fourth-Floor West-Facing 2x2!😍
posting_body: Taking Silicon Valley to new heights: refined downtown living at the Cupertino City Center.
Located in a convenient neighborhood, Cupertino City Center offers a high-rise two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment unlike any other.

While select homes include floor-to-ceiling windows, every two-bedroom floor plan is adorned with wood-style Metroflor flooring, Venetian gold granite countertops, white GE appliances and shaker-style cabinetry with nickel hardware.
Down the hallway from the utility closet equipped with a Maytag washer and dryer, the master suite features a mirrored closet and a private bathroom.
Enjoy the breathtaking view of the nearby parks and mountains from a private deck, or socialize with friends and neighbors in the courtyard.

Within the bounds of Cupertino Union School District, major tech companies, such as Apple, Google, and Facebook, Cupertino City Center’s convenient location puts you within walking distance of public transportation, the public library, and premier shops and restaurants.
Visit the website for more information on the local area.
